mapper.sql: id, client_id, product_id, good_id, good_count, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(good_id) FROM s_shop_car,s_product WHERE s_shop_car.product_id = s_product.id AND s_product.delete_status = 0 AND client_id = #{clientId} AND s_product.shelf_status = 1

SELECT s_product.shops shopId, max(s_shop_car.update_time) updateTime FROM s_shop_car, s_product WHERE s_shop_car.product_id = s_product.id AND client_id = #{clientId} GROUP BY s_product.shops ORDER BY updateTime DESC
